productDescription.productShortDescription: Classic straight-leg jeans from Levi's
productDescription.productLongDescription: The Levi's 501 Original Fit Jeans feature a classic straight-leg cut and a button fly. They're made from 100% cotton denim and come in a range of washes and sizes.

productDescription.productShortDescription: Sweat-wicking t-shirt for men
productDescription.productLongDescription: The Nike Men's Dri-FIT Training T-Shirt is made with sweat-wicking fabric to keep you dry and comfortable during your workout. It features a crew neck design and a regular fit.

productDescription.productShortDescription: Comfortable and stylish running shoes for women
productDescription.productLongDescription: The Adidas Women's Ultraboost Running Shoes are designed to provide comfort and support for your feet during your runs. They feature a Primeknit upper, a responsive Boost midsole, and a flexible outsole.

productDescription.productName: Tommy Hilfiger Men's Classic Puffer Jacket
productDescription.productShortDescription: Warm and stylish jacket for men
productDescription.productLongDescription: The Tommy Hilfiger Men's Classic Puffer Jacket is made with a durable nylon shell and a warm down fill. It features a stand-up collar, a zip front closure, and a logo patch on the chest.

productDescription.productName: Levi's Women's 721 High Rise Skinny Jeans
productDescription.productShortDescription: High-rise skinny jeans for women
productDescription.productLongDescription: The Levi's Women's 721 High Rise Skinny Jeans are designed to flatter your figure and provide all-day comfort. They feature a high-rise waist, a slim fit through the hips and thighs, and a skinny leg opening.

productDescription.productShortDescription: Comfortable and stylish sneakers from Nike
productDescription.productLongDescription: The Nike Air Max 270 React features a lightweight and breathable design, perfect for all-day wear. They also offer responsive cushioning and a stylish look that can be dressed up or down.

productDescription.productShortDescription: Warm and cozy jacket from Patagonia
productDescription.productLongDescription: The Patagonia Better Sweater Fleece Jacket is made from 100% recycled polyester fleece and features a zippered chest pocket and handwarmer pockets. It's perfect for chilly days and outdoor activities.

productDescription.productShortDescription: Heavy-duty parka from The North Face
productDescription.productLongDescription: The North Face McMurdo Parka is made from waterproof and breathable DryVent fabric and features a detachable hood, multiple pockets, and adjustable cuffs. It's perfect for extreme weather conditions.

productDescription.productShortDescription: Stylish and versatile pants from H&M
productDescription.productLongDescription: The H&M Slim Fit Chinos feature a classic design and come in a variety of colors. They're made from a stretch cotton blend for a comfortable and flattering fit.

productDescription.productName: Instant Pot Duo 7-in-1 Electric Pressure Cooker
productDescription.productShortDescription: A versatile electric pressure cooker
productDescription.productLongDescription: The Instant Pot Duo 7-in-1 Electric Pressure Cooker can be used as a pressure cooker, slow cooker, rice cooker, steamer, sauté pan, yogurt maker, and warmer. It has a 6-quart capacity and comes with 13 pre-programmed settings.

productDescription.productName: Dyson Cyclone V10 Absolute Lightweight Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner
productDescription.productShortDescription: A powerful cordless vacuum cleaner
productDescription.productLongDescription: The Dyson Cyclone V10 Absolute Lightweight Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner features a powerful motor and cyclone technology for effective cleaning. It's lightweight and cordless, with up to 60 minutes of run time on a single charge.

productDescription.productName: Ninja BL770 Mega Kitchen System Blender
productDescription.productShortDescription: A powerful blender for all your kitchen needs
productDescription.productLongDescription: The Ninja BL770 Mega Kitchen System Blender comes with a 72-ounce blending pitcher, 64-ounce food processor bowl, and two 16-ounce Nutri Ninja cups with to-go lids. It features a powerful motor and multiple speed settings for all your blending needs.

productDescription.productShortDescription: Transform your Instant Pot into an air fryer
productDescription.productLongDescription: The Instant Pot Air Fryer Lid lets you transform your Instant Pot into an air fryer. It features a crisp mode for crispy food and a fan for even cooking. It fits most 6-quart Instant Pot models.

productDescription.productShortDescription: A high-tech robot vacuum cleaner
productDescription.productLongDescription: The iRobot Roomba 960 Robot Vacuum features mapping technology and adaptive navigation to clean your home effectively. It can be controlled with a smartphone app or voice commands with Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant. It also features automatic recharging and resume cleaning.

productDescription.productShortDescription: Strengthening shampoo with active fruit protein
productDescription.productLongDescription: Garnier Fructis Shampoo is a strengthening shampoo that contains active fruit protein to strengthen hair from within. It leaves hair feeling healthier and stronger with each wash.

productDescription.productShortDescription: Refreshing body wash for men
productDescription.productLongDescription: Nivea Men's Body Wash is a refreshing body wash that cleanses and nourishes the skin. It has a masculine scent and is formulated with Hydra IQ technology to keep skin hydrated.

productDescription.productShortDescription: Antiperspirant deodorant for women
productDescription.productLongDescription: Secret Antiperspirant is a long-lasting antiperspirant deodorant that provides 48-hour odor and wetness protection. It has a clean scent and is designed for women.
